Goodbye_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:Think>"Mysterious Woman Seeks Specific Help
near <clr:0000>Outskirt Stable<clr:ffff>." Whoa. That's quite
a scoop. Listen to this...
"Rumor has it a woman is asking for help
from golden-haired travelers on behalf of
an unnamed person."
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Wait. This is Outskirt Stable! I should get
out there and try to solve the mystery of
the...mysterious mystery woman!
Goodbye_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Ease>To think that I can just sit here and read
all about the affairs of our world...<clr:0000><sp:0:4:0>Lucky Clover Gazette<clr:ffff>! What a wonder!
If they're understaffed, maybe I should
consider becoming a journalist.
Goodbye_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I'm intrigued by the rumor, but I need to
head to Gerudo Town... But... It's <clr:0000>getting<clr:ffff>
<clr:0000>cold <clr:ffff>at this time of day. I'll just go later.
